links.title: No fooling: Time for Elon Musk to explain why bankruptcy's not in the cards for Tesla
links.description: On April 1, Elon Musk tweeted that Tesla was bankrupt. He was just joking. April Fools'! This week, Musk will be forced to explain why bankruptcy isn't a serious possibility. Another record quarterly loss is widely anticipated. The consensus estimate among 27 Tesla analysts pegs that figure at slightly deeper than last quarter's record $675-million loss.

links.title: After 100,000 Miles, This Tesla Model S Is Still Almost Faultless
links.description: Is the U.K.'s highest-mileaged Tesla Model S still the gem that it once was? Britain's Car magazine answers the above question and a multitude more in its recent, lengthy article detailing its time with the 100,600-mileTesla Model S from 2013.
